Title: Relates to standing orders in hospitals
Summary: Authorizes hospitals to establish standing orders for use when directed by an attending physician or when an attending nurse determines, in his or her professional judgment, that implementing the standing order for the patient is clinically appropriate.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-v-1, Pub Health L; amd ยง6909, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to standing orders in hospitals
